EmailTemplate.name: ERP Order with parts Retail Dept
EmailTemplate.subject: ERP Order with Parts Required {!AcctSeed__Project__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Flavio and/or Elvis, the following account {!AcctSeed__Project__c.AcctSeed__Account__c} has an ERP that has parts required {!AcctSeed__Product_Part__c.Name}.
Please investigate.
